favourite.article: This a great rehearsal of the gospel narrative but as such verse 9 is very weak. What happened to the resurrection? When we declare that we believe in the resurrection of the body we are saying that we place our confidence in Christ's bodily resurrection because this means that ours (those who are in Christ) will surely follow. Paul says that if Christ is not raised we are still in our sins.
The only King of Glory... The same yesterday, today and forever... Crown HIM Lord of all.
This song humbles me whenever I sing it with my spirit soul mind and all. learnt it during me Sunday school days in the 70s and I still feel blessed whenever I sing it.

Yeshua is LORD LORD in the OT is YHVH YHVH means I AM WHO I AM. Exodus 3 YHVH in Hebrew is Yod Heh Va Heh These four letters are known as the Tetragrammaton. Taken separately they mean HAND LOOK NAIL. LOOK !!!!!!! John 8 : 24 Yeshua said "if you don't believe that I AM WHO I AM you will die in your sins"
I remember singing this song as a child. This morning I heard it play in my head and decided to google it. I am glad it did. It soothes the soul!

This hymn always reminds me of God's greatest gift to us if we believe on His Son we can have our sins forgiven and know peace with God, and may we worship Him, adore Him and bring praise and honour to His Holy Name.

I remember singing this hymn during family prayers right from grandma's time & I feel children should be taught this hymn. A wonderful hymn by Benjamin Russell Hanby on the Lord Jesus the King of glory .
